title: Somalia's coronavirus khat bans leaves chewers in a stew
description: Somalia's government curbs the use of khat after raising concern that it could help spread Covid-19.

title: Why this ICU nurse treating Covid patients could be deported
description: Jonathan Vargas Andres is one of many 'Dreamer' nurses awaiting a key Supreme Court decision.

title: Coronavirus and Antarctica: 'Isolated within isolation'
description: Why the people on the only continent without a recorded case of coronavirus are in lockdown.

title: Coronavirus: Inside a reopened primary school in the time of Covid-19
description: Primary school children in Denmark have been back at school for a month, the first country to reopen them in Europe.

title: Coronavirus: Teens document a day in lockdown around the world
description: As coronavirus lockdowns continue, we asked young teenagers in 14 different countries how they're coping.

title: They're 8,000 miles away and share the same passion
description: Erin Rae, in Nashville, and Mali, in Mumbai, share their experiences as musicians in lockdown.

title: Coronavirus: How to wear a face covering?
description: Across the world, people are being asked to wear face coverings to help stop coronavirus from spreading.

title: Sausage dog missing in Middleton Tyas found using bacon
description: Seven-month-old Floyd spent three days on a 350-acre farm in Middleton Tyas before he returned.

title: Coronavirus: What powers do the police have?
description: Police across the UK now have wide-ranging powers to help fight the coronavirus pandemic.

title: Coronavirus: The funeral director storing hundreds of bodies in the crisis
description: Deaths caused by Covid-19 have led to a shortage of space in some mortuaries and delays to funerals.

title: Coronavirus lockdown: Am I allowed to move house?
description: The easing of lockdown will affect those who want to buy or sell a home, or rent somewhere new, in England.

title: Coronavirus: Some return to work as lockdown eases slightly in England
description: Some trains and buses said to be too busy for social distancing, despite plea to avoid public transport.

title: Some anxieties over return, says England's Buttler
description: England wicketkeeper Jos Buttler says he feels some apprehension about leaving the coronavirus-enforced lockdown to return to action.

title: Coronavirus: Chancellor Rishi Sunak warns of 'significant recession'
description: The UK's economy shrank at the fastest pace since 2008 during the first three months of the year.

title: We will have summer tourist season, promises EU
description: The European Union proposes a gradual lifting of borders to kick-start the tourist industry.

title: Scrap relegation if Premier League completed but Championship is not, say Norwich
description: Norwich say relegation from the Premier League should be scrapped if the top flight completes its season but the Championship does not.

title: Gerry Adams wins appeal against Maze Prison escape convictions
description: The Supreme Court rules the ex-Sinn Féin leader was being held unlawfully at the Maze Prison in the 1970s.

title: Coronavirus: Social distancing 'impossible' on London commute
description: Many workers are returning to public transport in the capital after lockdown rules were relaxed.

title: Pichot resigns from World Rugby role after election defeat
description: Agustin Pichot resigns from his role on the World Rugby Council after his defeat by Sir Bill Beaumont in the election for World Rugby chairman.

title: Photographer seeks 'extraordinary' over-80s
description: Photographer Laura Page wins funding for a project she hopes will challenge ageism in the UK.

title: Ahmaud Arbery mum 'believes there will be justice'
description: The mother of Ahmaud Arbery, who was killed while out for a jog, says the case is moving in the "right direction".

title: Aluko apologises for tweets about people on furlough
description: Ex-England forward Eniola Aluko apologises after posting a series of tweets appearing to criticise people placed on furlough.

title: Tui warns of 8,000 job losses as it aims to reinvent holidays
description: The firm says it will provide holidays again as soon as possible, but thousands of posts will be cut.

title: Robert De Niro on coronavirus lockdown and US politics
description: The Oscar winning actor spoke to the BBC about life in New York during the outbreak and the country's leadership.

title: Match of the Day: Top 10 podcast - Shearer and Wright reveal their choice of best goals
description: There have been some iconic goals scored in recent history - but who did BBC Sport pundits consider the best?

title: Football Focus: Vote for which classic Premier League match highlights are shown
description: Choose which Premier League great escape you want to watch the highlights of on Football Focus.

title: Newspaper headlines: No 'cliff edge' and housing market 'kick-started'
description: The papers focus on the chancellor's announcement that the job retention scheme will be extended.

title: Coronavirus: Does lockdown easing 'follow the science'?
description: Why is England pressing ahead with plans to ease lockdown rules ahead of the rest of the UK?

title: Coronavirus: Family of 14 say life in lockdown is 'calmer'
description: Tom and Stacy Shaw say they are "coping well" while stuck at home with 12 of their children.
